ability.Concussive Roar: Damage from any of this Pokemon's sound-based moves is calculated using its Attack instead of Speacial Attack. Sound-based moves have a 30% chance to flinch the opponents.
ability.Absolute Power: Increases the power of physical moves or sound-based moves by 50 points but lowers the accuracy by 10 points.

Flare Blitz.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target.

Ice Spinner.effect: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.

Roar of War.effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. The next sound-based move drains 50% HP lost by the target.

Dragon Dance.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
